fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, I can toast bread and give it to another player for tonight. When they eat the bread, I will protect them from one attack of any value, prioritizing higher value attacks. 2 uses.
- At night, I can attempt to convince another player that they are a toaster. If the next night, they are not visited by a Good player or another player of their faction, I will attack them. I will notify them the night that this ability is used, and I can use this ability multiple times in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- I cannot give bread to myself, unless I am the only remaining SCP member, in which case I can only do so once.
- For every player that I kill, I am able to toast another piece of bread.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent the Foundation from recontaining me at all costs.
